Internship at ISO/CS (International Organisation of Standardization Central Secretariat)

From April 15th to August 30th

Location: Geneva, Switzerland

Departement: Information Technology Services Departement (ITS)

Subject: Development of an automated process and computer system allowing ISO member organizations to receive the official list of standards for sale, then modify, and submit their sales data for the calculation of royalties. Quality controls, data ingestion in our “business intelligence” platform.

Missions:

  • Analysis of existing process
  • Technical Review of commercial solutions that the Sales team may have started to evaluate
  • Proposal of a in-house architecture based on the tools and teechnologies that ISO ITS masters
  • Design and implementation of the export (Excel) and sending (email) system to ISO members;
  • Design and implementation of the system for collecting and validating declarations received (Excel)
  • Integration into ISO's Data Hub or into Qlik Sense BI system.
